children.text: Content: Recently, I am feeling absent-minded. To be honest, if I got dumped, it is my own fault. I do not even like myself anymore—I am spoiled, selfish, always looking for small advantages, not studying or working hard, just eating and sleeping all day, and spending the rest of... my time on useless chatter and playing with my phone.

children.onDataPointClick: {{showAlert('Post 25:What did I do wrong? Why do I have to live such a burdensome life? I don\'t want to add any more scars to my arm','info')}}
